class.name: CATLISTV(CATICatalogChapter_var)
class.abstract: Collection class for CATICatalogChapter interface handler.

class.name: CATLISTV(CATICatalogDescription_var)
class.abstract: Collection class for CATICatalogDescription interface handler.

class.name: CATLISTV(CATICatalogKeyword_var)
class.abstract: Collection class for CATICatalogKeyword interface handler.

class.name: CATLISTV(CATICatalogPersistentQuery_var)
class.abstract: Collection class for CATICatalogPersistentQuery interface handler.

class.name: CATICATALOGWorkshopAddin
class.abstract: Interface to customize the Catalog workshop.

class.name: CATICatalogBrowser
class.abstract: Interface to manipulate the Catalog Browser.

method.name: AuthorizeChangeCatalog
method.abstract: Authorizes or not user to change of current catalog.

method.name: AuthorizeDragDrop
method.abstract: Authorizes the instantiation with drag&drop.

method.name: AuthorizeInstantiation
method.abstract: Authorizes the instantiation with double click or the contextual menu.

method.name: BuildCurrentChapterString
method.abstract: Builds a CATUnicodeString to store the current chapter.

method.name: CloseBrowser
method.abstract: Closes the current browser.

method.name: GetCancelNotification
method.abstract: Retrieves the notification on the "Cancel" button.

method.name: GetChangeChapterNotification
method.abstract: Retrieves the notification when a modification on the current chapter has be done.

method.name: GetCloseNotification
method.abstract: Retrieves the notification when the browser is closed.

method.name: GetCurrentCatalogDocId
method.abstract: Retrieves the current catalog.

method.name: GetCurrentQueryResult
method.abstract: Retrieves the current query result.

method.name: GetFatherWindow
method.abstract: Retrieves the window to add notification.

method.name: GetOKNotification
method.abstract: Retrieves the notification on the "OK" button (a final description need to be selected).

method.name: GetSelectDescriptionNotification
method.abstract: Retrieves a notification on the selected description.

method.name: GetSelectedDescription
method.abstract: Retrieves the selected description.

method.name: OKActivationMode
method.abstract: Activates OK button only for end chapters, not for sub-chapters.

method.name: SetCurrentCatalogDocId
method.abstract: Sets the current catalog.

method.name: SetCurrentChapter
method.abstract: Sets the chapter to activate in the browser.

method.name: SetCurrentChapter
method.abstract: Sets a current sub-chapter in the catalog browser.

method.name: SetCurrentQuery
method.abstract: Sets the current query result.

method.name: SetSelectedDescription
method.abstract: Sets the selected description as the current in the browser.

class.name: CATICatalogBrowserFactory
class.abstract: Interface to open a Components Catalog Browser.

method.name: OpenCatalogBrowser
method.abstract: Opens a new Catalog Browser Dialog box.

method.name: AddDescription
method.abstract: Adds a new description on the chapter.

method.name: AddFamilyDescriptionsFromDesignTable
method.abstract: Adds a family of descriptions from a design table associated to a CATPart document.

method.name: AddKeyword
method.abstract: Creates a new keyword on the chapter.

method.name: AddKeyword
method.abstract: Creates a new keyword on the chapter.

method.name: AddPersistentQuery
method.abstract: Adds a new persistent query on the chapter.

method.name: FindKeyword
method.abstract: Retrieves a keyword from its name.

method.name: GetChapterName
method.abstract: Returns the name of the chapter.

method.name: GetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the default value of an integer type keyword.

method.name: GetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the default value of a real type keyword.

method.name: GetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the default value of a boolean type keyword.

method.name: GetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the default value of a string type keyword.

method.name: GetNumberOfDescriptions
method.abstract: Retrieves the number of descriptions on the chapter.

method.name: HeritageOfKeywords
method.abstract: Duplicates the Keywords on a chapter.

method.name: KindIsEndChapter
method.abstract: Returns the type of the chapter.

method.name: ListDescriptions
method.abstract: Retrieves all descriptions on the chapter.

method.name: ListKeywords
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of keywords on the chapter.

method.name: ListPersistentQuery
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of persistents queries on the chapter.

method.name: RemoveDescription
method.abstract: Removes a description on the chapter.

method.name: RemoveKeyword
method.abstract: Removes a keyword on the chapter.

method.name: RemovePersistentQuery
method.abstract: Removes a persistent query on the chapter.

method.name: RenameKeyword
method.abstract: Renames one of the keywords of the chapter.

method.name: SetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Sets a default value of an integer type keyword.

method.name: SetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Sets a default value of a real type keyword.

method.name: SetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Sets a default value of a boolean type keyword.

method.name: SetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Sets a default value of a string type keyword.

method.name: UnsetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Removes the default value for a keyword.

class.name: CATICatalogChapterFactory
class.abstract: Interface to manage (create,delete,list) chapters in a catalog document.

method.name: CreateChapter
method.abstract: Creates a new chapter.

method.name: DeleteChapter
method.abstract: Removes a chapter and all its descriptions and keywords.

method.name: FindChapter
method.abstract: Retrieves a chapter from its name in the current document.

method.name: FindListChapter
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of chapters from its name in the root container.

method.name: GetRootChapter
method.abstract: Retrieves the root chapter of the current document.

method.name: ListChapters
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of chapters in the root container.

class.name: CATICatalogDescription
class.abstract: Interface to inquire and define catalog descriptions.

method.name: GetBoolean
method.abstract: Retrieves the keyword value on the current description (CATBoolean).

method.name: GetChapter
method.abstract: Retrieves the chapter containing this description.

method.name: GetDescriptionType
method.abstract: Retrieves the type of the description (for description on objects).

method.name: GetDouble
method.abstract: Retrieves the keyword value on the current description (real).

method.name: GetInteger
method.abstract: Retrieves the keyword value on the current description (integer).

method.name: GetName
method.abstract: Retrieves the name of the description.

method.name: GetObject
method.abstract: Retrieves the object linked to the current description.

method.name: GetPreview
method.abstract: Retrieves an embedded image to current description.

method.name: GetPreviewName
method.abstract: Retrieves a preview file to current description.

method.name: GetString
method.abstract: Retrieves the keyword value on the current description (string).

method.name: GetSubChapter
method.abstract: Retrieves the subchapter from current description.

method.name: GetValue
method.abstract: Retrieves the keyword value on the current description.

method.name: IsObjectASubchapter
method.abstract: Return the type of the pointed chapter.

method.name: IsPointedDocumentAvailable
method.abstract: Checks if the link to the document is correct or not.

method.name: IsResolvedObjectComputed
method.abstract: Retrieves if the description is resolved or not.

method.name: ResetLinkToPointedDocument
method.abstract: Releases the pointing document if possible.

method.name: ResolvedDocumentFromDesignTable
method.abstract: Resolves the current description.

method.name: RunInstantiationCmd
method.abstract: Launches an instantiation.

method.name: SetBoolean
method.abstract: Sets the keyword value on the current description (boolean).

method.name: SetDocumentName
method.abstract: Create a link on current description from a file name.

method.name: SetDouble
method.abstract: Sets the keyword value on the current description (real).

method.name: SetInteger
method.abstract: Sets the keyword value on the current description (integer).

method.name: SetName
method.abstract: Sets the name for the description.

method.name: SetObject
method.abstract: Creates a link on the current description.

method.name: SetPreview
method.abstract: Associates an embedded image to the current description.

method.name: SetPreviewName
method.abstract: Associates an preview file to current description.

method.name: SetString
method.abstract: Sets the keyword value on the current description (string).

method.name: SetValue
method.abstract: Sets the keyword value on the current description.

method.name: UnsetKeyword
method.abstract: Suppresses the keyword value on current description.

enum.name: CATCatalogDescriptionType
enum.abstract: Enumeration to describe differents kinds of descriptions links to objects.

class.name: CATICatalogEnable
class.abstract: Interface to enable component integration into a catalog document.

class.name: CATICatalogInstantiation
class.abstract: Interface to instantiate a component catalog.

method.name: RunInstantiationCmd
method.abstract: Launches an instantiation command.

method.name: GetHidden
method.abstract: Returns the "hidden" property.

method.name: GetKeywordAlias
method.abstract: Retrieves the alias of the keyword.

method.name: GetKeywordName
method.abstract: Returns the name of the keyword.

method.name: GetKeywordType
method.abstract: Returns the type of the keyword.

method.name: GetKeywordUnit
method.abstract: Returns the unit of the keyword.

method.name: SetHidden
method.abstract: Sets the "hidden" property.

class.name: CATICatalogLink
class.abstract: Interface to manage link with a catalog description.

method.name: GetPointedDescription
method.abstract: Retrieves the pointed description.

method.name: GetRootPointedCatalog
method.abstract: Retrieves the pointed catalog if the pointed description is in a another container.

class.name: CATICatalogPersistentQuery
class.abstract: Interface to manage a persistent query.

method.name: GetChapter
method.abstract: Returns the chapter which contain this current persistent query.

method.name: GetExpression
method.abstract: Retrieves the knowledge expression defining the query.

method.name: GetGeneratedQueryResult
method.abstract: Retrieves the result of the resolved query.

method.name: GetListGeneratedDescriptions
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of the resulting descriptions.

method.name: GetResolutionChapter
method.abstract: Retrieves the chapter on which the query would be solved.

method.name: GetResolutionDate
method.abstract: Retrieves the time/date of the resulting descriptions when the query is resolved.

method.name: ResolveQuery
method.abstract: Resolves the query that is defined by the knowledge expression.

method.name: SetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Sets keyword Default Value for resolved attribute (integer).

method.name: SetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Sets keyword Default Value for resolved attribute (real).

method.name: SetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Sets keyword Default Value for resolved attribute (boolean).

method.name: SetDefaultValue
method.abstract: Sets keyword Default Value for resolved attribute (string).

method.name: SetExpression
method.abstract: Sets the knowledge expression defining the query.

method.name: SetResolutionChapter
method.abstract: Sets the chapter on which the query would be solved to the current query.

method.name: SetResolutionDate
method.abstract: Sets the time/date of the resulting descriptions when the query is resolved.

class.name: CATICatalogQuery
class.abstract: Interface to launch a temprorary query on a catalog chapter.

method.name: Query
method.abstract: Launches a query on the current chapter.

method.name: AsAList
method.abstract: Retrieves the list of descriptions.

method.name: GetChapter
method.abstract: Retrieves the chapter from the current query.

method.name: GetQuery
method.abstract: Returns the knowledge expression of the current query.

method.name: GetQueryMode
method.abstract: Returns the type of the query.

method.name: Size
method.abstract: Returns the number of descriptions solving the query.

method.name: GetAlias
method.abstract: Retrieves the display name of the description.

method.name: GetEmbeddedPreview
method.abstract: Retrieves embedded preview.

method.name: GetKeywordValue
method.abstract: Retrieves an integer keyword value.

method.name: GetKeywordValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a boolean keyword value.

method.name: GetKeywordValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a string keyword value.

method.name: GetKeywordValue
method.abstract: Retrieves a double keyword value.

typedef.name: CATCciCatalogBrowserDisplayOptions
typedef.abstract: The Catalog browser display options list.
